tool_description: Initiates domain transfer between registrars by validating auth codes, checking transfer eligibility, and starting the transfer process.

target_registrar.description: Registrar to transfer the domain to

privacy_protection.description: Enable privacy protection at new registrar

error_messages: Invalid auth code: The authorization code is invalid or has expired.
Domain not eligible: Domain cannot be transferred (too recent registration, locked status, etc.).
Transfer in progress: A transfer for this domain is already in progress.
Registrar not supported: The target registrar is not supported for transfers.
Payment required: Valid payment method required to complete the transfer.
usage: Provide the domain name, auth code from current registrar, and target registrar. Optionally configure auto-renewal and privacy protection settings. The tool initiates the domain transfer process.

next_steps.description: Required actions to complete the transfer
